div1.p: Courtesy of U.S. Army Medical Museum

div1.head: Photograph of the 1st Division Field Hospital, 7th Army Corps, Camp Columbia, Havana, Cuba, March 1899
div1.p:
RUSSELL BROS. ANNISTON ALA #317
FIELD HOSPITAL, 1ST DIVISION, 7TH ARMY CORPS, CAPACITY 500 BEDS
CAMP COLUMBIA. - .HAVANA CUBA, MAR. 1899
VIEW FROM CENTER OF HOSPITAL SHOWING 3 COMPANIES OF THE HOSPITAL
CORPS DETACHMENT AND WOMEN NURSES
J.R.McDILL.
MAJOR AND BRIGADE SURGEON U.S.V. COMMANDING.
